name: The Falconers: Moonlight
description: The Falconers: Moonlight is a supernatural thriller visual novel set in the 19th Century West Coast of New Zealand. Falconer, Cassandra Winter, is on her first solo mission. Can she save the people of Moonlight from their plight? Or will she disappear into the mist like so many others before her?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2+ Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
